article.title: Advanced 15-Minute Facial-Lift
article.body_html:
Upgrade from our 5-Minute Facial-Lift with this enhanced treatment that includes a mix of glides and holds for better contour and firming results.
Treatment time:

15 Minutes

Treatment requires:
Shop Now
OR
Shop Now

Before you begin, make sure your device is fully charged. When on the cradle or plugged into the charging cord, a solid blue light on the front of your device indicates a full charge.

Using a NuFACE mini? Be sure to turn your device off and back on after each treatment area below. The NuFACE mini device will turn off automatically after five minutes of use.

STEP 1: PREP

  1. Cleanse the skin with an oil-free cleanser, removing any makeup, oils and impurities.
    Optional: Apply preferred NuFACE serum by tapping into your skin with your fingertips.
  2. Apply NuFACE Gel Primer in a mask-like layer to one area at a time, beginning with the left cheek. Skin should appear wet, and you should feel no sensation from the device. 
  3. Turn on your device by pressing the ON/OFF button. Press the intensity control button until you reach the maximum level. Intensity can be adjusted for comfort at any time. 

STEP 2: LIFT

Treatment 1: Improved definition and cheek contour

  1. Jowl & jawline: Place bottom sphere on the left jawline with the top sphere slightly outside the corner of the mouth (Position 1). Slowly glide to the lower ear until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
  2. Lower cheek: Place the bottom sphere under the corner of the mouth with the top sphere above the corner of the mouth (Position 2). Slowly glide to the mid-ear until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
  3. Upper cheek: Place the bottom sphere outside the corner of the mouth with the top sphere just along the side of the nose (Position 3). Slowly glide to the upper ear until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
    Do not place spheres in the eye area. Glide along the orbital bone under the eye.
  4. Return to Position 1 and repeat the above sequence two more times..
  5. Once you've completed the above 3 times, continue to next section below.

Treatment 2: Improved definition of the jowls / jawline

  1. Jowl & jawline: Place spheres horizontally on the jawline, towards the middle of the chin (Position 1). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  2. Center of jawline: Place spheres horizontally on the jawline, toward the center of the jawline (Position 2). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  3. Edge of jawline: Place spheres horizontally on the jawline, toward the edge of the jawline (Position 3). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  4. Once you've completed the above, continue to next section below. It is not necessary to repeat this section.

Treatment 3: Improved definition of the jawline & cheek

  1. Jowl & jawline: Place bottom sphere vertically on the jawline with the top sphere slightly outside the corner of the mouth (Position 1). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  2. Jowl & nasolabial fold: Place bottom sphere vertically on the jawline with the top sphere slightly under the lower cheekbone (Position 2). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  3. Jowl & cheekbone: Place bottom sphere vertically on the end of the jawline with the top sphere slightly under the cheekbone (Position 3). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  4. Once you've completed the above, continue to next section below. It is not necessary to repeat this section.

Treatment 4: Improved cheek contour

  1. Lower cheekbone: Place sphere horizontally with the right sphere slightly outside the corner of the mouth (Position 1). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  2. Lower cheekbone: Place sphere horizontally with the right sphere under the lower cheekbone (Position 2). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  3. Upper cheekbone: Place sphere horizontally with the right sphere under the upper cheekbone (Position 3). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  4. Once you've completed the above, continue to next section below. It is not necessary to repeat this section.

Treatment 5: Raised brow & forehead wrinkle reduction

  1. Thick of brow: Place both spheres horizontally above the thick of the eyebrow (Position 1). Slowly glide upward toward the hairline until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
  2. Arch of brow: Place both spheres horizontally, slightly above the arch of the eyebrow (Position 2). Slowly glide upward toward the hairline until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
  3. Thin of brow: Place both spheres horizontally, slightly above the thin of the eyebrow (Position 3). Slowly glide upward toward the hairline until the beep sounds (5 seconds).
  4. Return to Position 1 and repeat the above sequence two more times.
  5. Once you've completed the above 3 times, continue to next section below.

Treatment 6: Wrinkle reduction & toning of forehead

  1. Middle of forehead (bottom right): Place both spheres horizontally, above the thick of the brow (Position 1). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  2. Middle of forehead (top right): Place both spheres horizontally, above the thick of the brow (Position 2). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  3. Edge of forehead (bottom left): Place both spheres horizontally, above the thin of the brow (Position 3). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  4. Edge of forehead (top left): Place both spheres horizontally, above the thin of the brow (Position 4). Lift and hold for 1-2 beeps (5-10 seconds).
  5. Once you've completed the above, continue to next section below. It is not necessary to repeat this section.


Repeat Treatments 1-6 on the opposite side of your face.

STEP 3: FINISH

  1. Power off your NuFACE device and clean off any excess gel from the attachments.
  2. Place your device on its charging cradle or plug into the charging cord so it's ready for next time.
  3. Remove any gel primer from face with a damp cloth or cleansing wipe.
  4. Apply your favorite NuFACE Serum or continue with your normal skin care routine.
